            trader_ordersend = var_manager.get_variable("trader_ordersend")

                       SELECT *
                       FROM follow_order_detail
                       WHERE symbol LIKE %s

                new_user["account"],

                db_transaction=db_transaction,
                sql=sql,
                params=params,
                time_field="create_time"
            )
